name: Backbone UK
tagline: Supporting the Spine of Your Company
description:
Established in 1998, Backbone is a highly respected and successful technology solutions provider proud to be focused on quality and service. Our team delivers sensible, future proofed-solutions to satisfy your needs.
Initially, we specialized in network consultancy, implementation and support services. Over time, we've added new services to our portfolio. We service clients worldwide with both traditional on-premise consultancy and support, and have seen a growing demand for hosted cloud offerings delivered via our flagship RTW Hosting platform.
READ MORE...
